Coronavirus Updates
SUU SUCCESS Academy works closely with SUU, DSU, Washington County School District and Iron County School District on all things related to the Coronavirus. Our student's safety is always our priority.
In conjunction with Governor Herbert and the Health Department, all public education classes have been moved to an online setting until further notice. We will notify if this end date changes. Please make sure your email address and phone number are updated in Powerschool. We will be reaching out to you with email and Remind101.
Our teachers and professors will reach out to all students by email. This email will describe the curriculum and content process for their online learning experience. Please be sure to check your school email to see how your teachers will be conducting your online classes and curriculum.
Our campus will remain open during this time period and we will have online chromebooks available if needed. We want to make sure all students have access to these resources. Please let us know if there will be any connection issues.
We realize this will create some challenges, but we have been preparing for this event and will work with you to ensure this process will be as smooth as possible.
Please refer to ICSD's page for updates. This will apply to all students in classes on SUU SUCCESS Academy's campus.
Please refer to SUU's updates for all classes held on SUU's campus. This will apply to mostly Seniors and Juniors who have classes at SUU.
Please refer to DSU Covid-19 Emergency Response Plan. This will apply to DSU SUCCESS Academy students with classes loacated on DSU campus (outside DSU SUCCESS Academy's building).
Please refer to Washington County School District's Coronavirus page for updates. This will apply to all classes held at DSU SUCCESS Academy.

About Us
Why Early College?
At SUCCESS Academy we provide motivated, focused, and diligent students the opportunity to engage in Early College experiences. Upon successful completion of our course sequence students have the opportunity to earn credit toward an Associates degree with an emphasis in Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics and their high school diploma. We have many students who complete both their Associate degree and high school diploma! Read more
Latest News
Aug2019
SUCCESS Academy Ranked #2 Best School District in Utah
Niche.com released their 2020 school year "Best School Districts in Utah" awards. SUCCESS Academy was ranked SECOND! We also rank SECOND for the Safest School District in Utah, and FOURTH in Utah School Districts with the Best Teachers. Our district includes SUU SUCCESS and DSU SUCCESS. Rankings are based on several criteria including geographic information, parent and student reviews, and public data sources. As always, we want to thank our amazing teachers for being so amazing! They're a huge reason we're so SUCCESSful!
Aug2018
SUCCESS Academy Named a Reason St. George is America's Fastest-Growing City
KSL news published an article on some of the reasons St. George is America's fastest growing city. One of the five reasons listed is because of the education opportunities. It lists SUCCESS Academy as one of those opportunities. The article states, "Schools like Success Academy are changing high school and pre-college academics for the better with early college courses to help students succeed". Read the full article here.
Jun2018
SUCCESS Academy Ranked Second Best School District in Utah
Niche.com recently released their Best School Districts in Utah. SUCCESS Academy is SECOND! We received A rankings in the Academics, Teachers, College Prep, and Health and Safety categories. In fact, our teachers are so great, we received the #2 ranking in the state for "Districts with the Best Teachers in Utah"! (We know this already! Glad the state does as well.) We also ranked fifth for safest school district! See how Niche calculates their rankings here.
